meanings.definition: people who are enthusiastic about high-fidelity sound reproduction
meanings.sent1: Audiophiles enjoy listening to music with high-quality sound systems.
meanings.sent2: Many audiophiles spend hours researching the best audio equipment.
meanings.sent3: The audiophiles organized a sound quality competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her love for crystal-clear music made her the audiophile queen of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The audiophiles' passion for perfect sound is unmatched.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of audiophiles
meanings.sent1: The store specialized in audiophile-grade speakers for enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: His audiophile taste in music led him to collect rare vinyl records.
meanings.sent3: It was an audiophile party, with guests discussing speaker brands all night.
meanings.sent4: The audiophile community's dedication to quality is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The audiophile sound system transformed the room into a concert hall.

meanings.sent1: The audiophiles gathered for a meetup to share their favorite albums.
meanings.sent2: In the audiophiles' club, members exchanged tips on improving sound quality.
meanings.sent3: The audiophiles' meeting turned into a lively debate on the best headphones.
meanings.sent4: The group of audiophiles formed a tight-knit community of music lovers.
meanings.sent5: Among the audiophiles, there was a sense of camaraderie and shared passion.
